attributes.action: Prevent schools from contributing towards childhood eating disorders.
attributes.additional_details: I am raising the current petition in order to prevent schools from contributing toward childhood eating disorders. According to the NHS over £70M was invested by the government by 2021. However, our children are currently subject to public weigh-ins facing embarrassment and receiving labels regarding their body weight. The implications of such actions are causing children self esteem/ body issues. We therefore recommend private weigh-ins to avoid such consequences.
attributes.background: Stop subjecting our children to public humiliation by exposing their physical differences in front of staff members and peers.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612418
